wikitext.*:
{{disambig-more|Pen|[[Pen (disambiguation)]]}}
'''PED''' is a [[Common Eldarin]] [[Sundocarme|root]] signifying "fall in steep slant, incline, slope, slant down".<ref name=PE17>{{PE|17}}, pp. 171, 173 (root appearing as "√PED-")</ref><ref name=WJ>{{WJ|B}}, p. 375 (root appearing as "*PED")</ref>

==Derivatives==

*[[Sindarin]]: ''ped-''<ref name=PE17/>

*[[Common Eldarin]]: ''pendā'' ("sloping"; "adjective = 'steeply sloping'")<ref name=PE17/><ref name=WJ/>
**[[Quenya]]: ''penda'' ("steeply sloping"); ''penda-'' ("weak verb 'slope, incline'")
**[[Sindarin]]: ''[[penn#Sindarin|pend, penn]]''; ''penna-'' ("come down in a slant, fall")<ref name=PE17/>

==Other versions==

In the ''[[The Etymologies|Etymologies]]'' appears the [[Primitive Quendian]] root '''PEN, PÉNED'''. Among its derivatives are:<ref name=LR>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 380 (root appearing as "PEN-, PÉNED-")</ref>

*Quenya: ''pende'' ("slope, downslope, declivity")
*[[Noldorin]]: ''[[penn#Noldorin|penn, pend]]''; ''am-benn''<ref name=VT46>{{VT|46a}}, p. 8</ref> ("uphill"); ''dadbenn'' ("downhill, inclined, prone (to do)"<ref name=VT46/>)
